body.p:
Court of Aldermen, Repertory I2(2) MT: CoL/CA[01[01/013
f 450 (15 March)
...
ltem certeyn Artycles devysed by the wardeyns of the felowship of the
Mynstrelles to be graunted & enacted for a lawe hereby theym exhibyted
this day were red And agreid by the Courte for asmoche as the same Seame
vnto theym to be honeste & reasonable that they shall be preferryd at the
nexte comen counseyll with their reasonable favour/
. ..

f 402(l [une)
Item it was agreid & adiuged by the hole Courte that [E] Elizabeth peryn
& Elizabeth Albere who by good & suffycyent wytnes were here convycte
& provyd to be comen bawdes the one of theym to the other & also verye
harlottes & comen of their bodyes shuld futhwith accordynge to the
auncyente lawes & ordenaunces of this Cytie be caried aboute the same

Cytie in a Carte with ray hodes vpon their heddes whyte roddes in their
handes & basons & pannes ryngynge a fore theym thurrough out all the
market places of the seid Cytie & also to the Crowched fryers where they
dyd dwell & form thens to becaried, in fourme aforsaid to the prison
agaynst that they came froo there to remayne tyll they shall fynde good
suerties for theyr good abearynge & honeste behavior from hensforward/
...
